Stanley Druckenmiller said in 2023 that copper was ‚Äúthe tightest position I‚Äôve ever studied.‚Äù

The AI economy‚Äôs power buildout only tightens that further with every viable path running straight through copper.

Initiated a starter position in the growth port for copper exposure.

AI ECONOMY HAS THREE FUNDAMENTAL INPUTS RIGHT NOW

1. Compute (GPUs): $NVDA still dominates but $AMD is becoming a credible second source while custom silicon from $GOOGL & $AMZN is earning a real seat at the table as hyperscalers push harder on ASICs. 

2. Memory (HBM): AI is becoming memory-first as models & agents think longer & retain more context. Every new generation requires more HBM per GPU which increases dollars per chip & makes $MU one of the most under-appreciated leverage points in the stack.

3. Power: The emerging bottleneck because efficiency improves ~2x per generation but compute demand scales ~4‚Äì5x so the gap is widening.

It used to be about who could deliver the most compute per dollar but now it‚Äôs about who can deliver the most compute per watt.

$ASML CEO warns that without major gains in power efficiency, training frontier AI models could eventually consume the world‚Äôs energy supply.

If scaling laws hold and no breakthroughs emerge, models trained in 2027 may require $100B+ compute clusters just to run.

Tom Lee says Ethereum could briefly dip to ~$2,400 calling it a ‚Äútouch-and-go‚Äù bottom.

He adds that this move would likely coincide with precious metals peaking.

$BMNR

Jensen Huang says $NVDA plans to make huge investments into OpenAI.

He added that OpenAI could become Nvidia‚Äôs largest investment ever.

Talks on a potential ~$100B $NVDA + OpenAI deal have stalled.

Jensen Huang has reportedly grown skeptical of OpenAI‚Äôs business model.

YOUR HAMSTER IS FUCKED.

If stocks collapse next week alongside Gold, and Treasuries stand alone, I can promise you I‚Äôm going to absolutely fucking annoy and destroy you all.

There are no gurus, only cycles.

Your hamster is fucked.

Yes.

It‚Äôs a bullshit marketing term.

I have a million followers across all social media platforms.

Have raised over a billion dollars in my funds over my career.

Work with 30 fund issuers, and 250 financial advisors.

Gold by definition is not a store of value because it has tail risk.

Now go back to your mom‚Äôs basement and play with your pet hamster.

At the gym.

People think if you work out you‚Äôre strong.

No.

We are just the broken ones.

We are here to heal.
